title: andhakaasura
sahitya:
andhakAsura sUdanA agni lOcanA

anupallavi

bandha pApamOcanA bilva mAlA bhUSaNA nIlakandarA karuNAkarA nirantara mAm pAlaya

caraNam

shrI hari vidhimukha sEvita cinmaya saccidAnanda mOha rahita muni sEvita mUSika vAhana pUjita
shrI harahara shankara shivakAmi manOhara shrI harikEshA citsabhEshA Isha
